title: Messages
title-message: Messages are the primary focus of Horsepower, they are what make your components do what they do.

docs.title: ajaxResponse
docs.message: Called when there is a response from an ajax request that was made by this.ajax.get or this.ajax.post

docs.title: childAdded
docs.message: Called when a child element gets added. The child may or not be a direct child of the element.
